name: manatee
description:
Feed the mana streams and go on a journey with the finnish cable car
This is a VR game created for the Mana Pool game jam

The team
  • Nomi : 3D modelling, design - @the_nomi
  • Harley Gresham  : 3D modelling - @harleygresham
  • Amos Sorri : Level design, voice over, design - moyahorror.com
  • Hajime Kasai : Design, photogrammety
  • alpha_rats : Development, technical art, design - @alpha_rats
  • MstrMagpie : Sound design 
  • El Murki, Dragon Uma : Additional SFX
  • Dragon Uma : music - https://ryumamiyamoto.bandcamp.com/
